\subsection{Detailed Description}
A P\-H\-P library of helpful string manipulation methods. This class does not need to be assigned to an object, as you could use the \-:\-: access method, such as \hyperlink{class_strings_a5b990c86396c708411bd61def2d8d71f}{Strings\-::is\-String} to access them statically

\subsubsection[{add\-Slashes\-To\-String}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}static add\-Slashes\-To\-String (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{}]{\$element, }
\item[{}]{\$check\-\_\-gpc = {\ttfamily true}}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [static]}}}\label{class_strings_a3bd1e606cfb8ad12731bc78482ba0d62}
Adds slashes to a string, or all elements of an array, no matter how nested the array is.

If the 'check\-\_\-gpc' parameter is true then slashes will be applied depending on magic\-\_\-quotes setting.

\end{DoxyReturn}
